question: Arif Mohammed resigned due to his opposition to which of the following in Parliament?
option1:
Muslim Women
Protection of Rights on Divorce) Act, 1986
answer:
Muslim Women
Protection of Rights on Divorce) Act, 1986
explanation: Arif Mohammed resigned due to his opposition to the Muslim Women (Protection of Rights on Divorce) Act, 1986. He has been a cabinet minister in the Union Government. Currently he is serving as the Governor of Kerala.
